experiences.title: ERP Application Consultant
experiences.details:
Implement solutions for clients and attend to their needs.

 Advising and teaching clients how to use dynamics NAV.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.company: Crystal Clear Software LTD, Kampala RD
experiences.details: Listened to client requirements and customized "Loan Performer" desktop app in that direction, Converted codebase from a FOXPRO programming language to C# equivalent. Converted and redesigned report layouts from FoxPro to Telerik which is more modern. Implemented XML-based web services to facilitate communication between different versions of the application..

experiences.title: Apprentice developer
experiences.details: Created a simple e-commerce site called automart in pure vanilla javascript ,express ,node, css, html no frameworks. Got early exposure to react js and software development trends like TDD.
